page.title: 05Employment
page.content: Ours is a time of unemployment.We read in the newspapers and see on T.V. how more than 3,000,000 people are unemployed.We decided to see whether lots of our parents were unemployed. We have 21 families represented in our class.There are 22 children but Joanne and Neil are twins. Only one family has an unemployed mother and father. Sixteen families have{both}parents working.In four families only the father is working.The mums are housewives.We found no family where the mother was the only breadwinner. We live in a mainly working class area in the North West of England where unemployment is said to be very high. We wondered why there were so few of our families who were in employment.Our findings are on the next page of our contribution.
